name: HILU
notes:
The twin hulled 'outrigger' HILU, (not technically a catamaran or PROA) was designed to use many of the parts and appendages made for AMF/ALCORTS other models such as rudder, daggergoard and rig. Although the company did print a sales brochure, it was not a huge seller. 
Length of outrigger: 10'.
